data.what_is: Customer retention platform. Deliver your message to the right consumer at the right time.
data.product_description: Customer retention platform. Deliver your message to the right consumer at the right time

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ContactConsumers?
According to me it is one of the best SMS and Email marketing platform and it used  by various organization as it help to connect customerwith their preferred channels from anywhere in the world which help them to grow their business and boost the performance and provide better results.

What do you dislike about ContactConsumers?
So far the experience has been good so there is nothing I dislike about the software as it is easy to use and we can improve the growth of our businesses.

What problems is ContactConsumers solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is helping customer to recognize the potential of their business and provide better outcome as it help and connect customers with thier preferred channels from anywhere. It provide SMS and Email marketing campaigns.
